name: KOD-RAY
description:
"You choose the worthy person"

So becareful! What you choose will change the ending.

I don't know what to say about the game. there is no story or actual gameplay. So I prefer let you play the game yourself and understand what the game's point is.

I guess the game might be a little confusing for you. of course the game's message is obvious for me but I'd like to know if I could show it successfully or not. So I would appreciate if you let me know what you got from the game in the comments below. Thanks.

Hope you to be enjoyed.
